channel.title: Events on Palmyra International Shotgun Range
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Palmyra International Shotgun Range

item.title: Dog Days of Summer
item.description: The Dog Days of Summer Shootout is a 150 Target International Trap Match/ PA Junior Olympic Championships. Lunch is included Saturday and Sunday Cost $125.00 Cash or Check. PA Junior Olympics Championships. (USA Shooting Sectioned Event) The first 125 Targets will be used to determine the PA USA Shooting Junior Olympic Championships. Out of state shooters are encouraged to attend. They will not be eligible for State Medals but Out of State Awards will be given.

item.title: Palmyra International Bunker Inaugural Open
item.description: Palmyra International Bunker Inaugural Open 150 Target International Trap Match -Practice on Friday June 26 from 10:00 till 5:00 -Lunch is included Saturday and Sunday -Cost $125.00 Cash or Check. -Bring the Family our range is 12 minuets from Hershey Park:-) Classes A-B-C-D Category Men - Women - Junior- Senior Course of fire: 75 Target on June 27 Saturday with 50 Target Junior Final 75 Targets on June 28 Sunday with 50 Target Open Final Juniors are able to shoot in both finals if they shoot the scores.
